de.alphahelix.alphalibary.annotations.command

Annotation Type Command


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface Command

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      java.lang.String[] alias
      Is used to retrieve possible aliases for the command
      java.lang.String description
      Retrieves a description which is shown by /help
      java.lang.Class<? extends ErrorHandler> errorHandler
      Defines a ErrorHandler to be used to handle errors
      int max
      Defines how many arguments can be parsed
      int min
      Defines how many arguments need to be parsed
      java.lang.String name
      Is used to retrieve the name of the command, if nothing is set the default is the method name
      boolean onlyPlayers
      Defines if the console sender can also use this command.
      java.lang.String resultPrefix
      Defines a String which is shown in front of every message which is send by this command
      java.lang.String usage
      Describes the help, which is displayed by /help

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        Is used to retrieve the name of the command, if nothing is set the default is the method name
        Returns:
        name of the command
        Default:
        ""

      • alias

        public abstract java.lang.String[] alias
        Is used to retrieve possible aliases for the command
        Returns:
        possible aliases
        Default:
        {}

      • usage

        public abstract java.lang.String usage
        Describes the help, which is displayed by /help
        Returns:
        the usage of the command in /help
        Default:
        ""

      • description

        public abstract java.lang.String description
        Retrieves a description which is shown by /help
        Returns:
        a description for this command
        Default:
        ""

      • min

        public abstract int min
        Defines how many arguments need to be parsed
        Returns:
        the minimum arguments to be parsed
        Default:
        0

      • max

        public abstract int max
        Defines how many arguments can be parsed
        Returns:
        the maximum arguments to be parsed
        Default:
        -1

      • onlyPlayers

        public abstract boolean onlyPlayers
        Defines if the console sender can also use this command.
        Please don't use Player as first argument when this is false.
        Default:
        false

      • resultPrefix

        public abstract java.lang.String resultPrefix
        Defines a String which is shown in front of every message which is send by this command
        Returns:
        a prefix for every message send by this command
        Default:
        ""

      • errorHandler

        public abstract java.lang.Class<? extends ErrorHandler> errorHandler
        Defines a ErrorHandler to be used to handle errors
        Returns:
        a ErrorHandler implementation
        Default:
        de.alphahelix.alphalibary.annotations.command.errors.ResultErrorHandler.class
